scripts.dev:web: npm run prepare:shared && npm run dev --workspace @ags/web
scripts.dev:server: npm run prepare:shared && npm run dev --workspace @ags/server
scripts.dev: npm run prepare:shared && concurrently -n web,server -c cyan,green "npm run dev --workspace @ags/web" "npm run dev --workspace @ags/server"
scripts.host:prod: npm run host:build && npm run host
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @ags/shared && npm run build --workspace @ags/server && npm run build --workspace @ags/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @ags/web && npm run lint --workspace @ags/server
